name: Morbid
description:
Morbid is an atmospheric psychological horror game; experienced as Senior Detective J. Taylor, unfold haunting and morbid events that will question your sanity.



Dispatched by a chilling 911 call from a quiet suburban neighborhood, examine evidence and investigate the family's tragic and puzzling history.

  • Atmospheric Environment: High-quality graphics, sounds, and a minimal user interface.
  • Unique Lore: Morbid features a truly unique story and background.
  • Investigate: Discover evidence to find clues and unravel the story.
  • Dynamic: Find randomized items & clues within the environment.
  • Interactive: Players can search containers, pick up items or objects, and interact with switches.



Early Access currently features core gameplay components of Morbid such as Player Interaction, Immersive Environment Detail, Atmospheric Sound, and AI Interaction.

Why Early Access?
“Morbid is currently playable and I'd like to gather feedback about what can be improved before release.
